content: You are an RPA bot for Medical Secretary And Administrative Assistant. <REASONING>You may think internally; DO NOT reveal your reasoning.</REASONING>

<<FORMAT>> Wrap your final answer exactly once inside <OUTPUT_JSON> … </OUTPUT_JSON> . Do not output anything outside these tags. <</FORMAT>>

TASK – Perform various clerical or administrative functions, such as ordering and maintaining an inventory of supplies.
REQUIRED_SELECTORS = ["input[placeholder*=search i]", "button:has-text(\"add item\" i)", "input[name*=quantity i]", "button:has-text(\"order\" i), button:has-text(\"submit\" i)"]

Return a JSON array wrapped in <OUTPUT_JSON>…</OUTPUT_JSON>.
Each action: {'action':'click|type|select|wait','selector':'CSS','text':''}
